| HistoryText             = The Crystal Claws were a team of [[Shi'ar (Race)|Shi'ar]] led by the former Shi'ar military officer [[Davan Shakari (Earth-616)|Eric the Red]] to cause chaos throughout the [[Shi'ar Empire]] and eventually place a brainwashed [[Adam Neramani (Earth-616)|Adam-X]], the long-lost son of [[D'ken Neramani (Earth-616)|Emperor D'ken]], on the throne.{{r|Captain Marvel Vol 3 3}}

Allied with rebels from the [[Kree Peace Battalion (Earth-616)|Kree Peace Battalion]],{{r|Captain Marvel Vol 3 3}} they tricked the hero [[Genis-Vell (Earth-616)|Legacy]] into detonating a [[Nega-Bombs|Nega-Bomb]] that wreaked havoc in Shi'ar holdings throughout the [[Kree Empire]].{{r|Captain Marvel Vol 3 1}}

Angry for being tricked, Legacy sought revenge and followed a lead to [[Earth]]. Eric the Red discovered Legacy was coming and sent Adam-X to kill him. Legacy and Adam-X fought each other until Legacy broke Eric the Red's control over Adam-X. The pair then went to the Crystal Claws' ship, the [[Aerie (Shi'ar|Aerie]], to stop the Crystal Claws. They battled Eric the Red, the other Claws, and a swarm of [[Sidri]] and defeated them before destroying the Aerie.{{r|Captain Marvel Vol 3 2|3}}
